headline: Used EVs are an 'amazing bargain' for car buyers
summary: Kelley Blue Book executive editor Brian Moody comes on Market Catalysts to discuss the average price for used cars and EVs, as well as the rate of depreciation for electric vehicles. Also hear Brian Moody's thoughts on the performance of top EV makers going forward after the expiration of the electric vehicle tax credit. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.
